languages.text: "Однажды час наступит, и проклятье Вульфена приберет меня. И час сей близок — я слышу скрип когтей по снегу. Но он еще не наступил".
"The hour will come, and the Curse of the Wulfen will have me. And that hour approaches. I can hear the crunch of snow beneath claws. But it has not arrived yet."
languages.original_text: "Однажды час наступит, и проклятье Вульфена приберет меня. И час сей близок — я слышу скрип когтей по снегу. Но он еще не наступил".

traits.locale_text: "The hour will come, and the Curse of the Wulfen will have me. And that hour approaches. I can hear the snow creaking beneath the claws. But it has not arrived yet."
"The hour will come, and the Curse of the Wulfen will have me. And that hour approaches. I can hear the snow creaking beneath the claws. But it has not arrived yet."
"The hour will come, and the Curse of the Wulfen will have me. And that hour approaches. I can hear the snow creaking beneath the claws. But it has not arrived yet."
"The hour will come, and the Curse of the Wulfen will have me. And that hour approaches. I can hear the snow creaking beneath the claws. But it has not arrived yet."
"The hour will come, and the Curse of the Wulfen will have me. And that hour approaches. I can hear the crunch of snow beneath claws. But it has not arrived yet."
"The hour will come, and the Curse of the Wulfen will have me. And that hour approaches. I can hear the crunch of snow beneath claws. But it has not arrived yet."

languages.text: « L'heure viendra, et la Malédiction du Wulfen s'emparera de moi. Le moment approche. J'entends déjà la neige qui crisse entre ses griffes. Mais elle n'est pas encore là pour moi. »
languages.original_text: "The hour will come, and the Curse of the Wulfen will have me. And that hour approaches. I can hear the crunch of snow beneath claws. But it has not arrived yet."

traits.locale_text: « L'heure viendra, et la Malédiction du Wulfen s'emparera de moi. Le moment approche. J'entends la neige qui crisse entre ses griffes. Mais elle n'est pas encore là pour moi. »

languages.text: “注定的时刻必将到来，狼人诅咒必将会吞噬我。那一刻已经越来越近了，我也已经听到白雪在狼爪下吱吱作响的声音了，但现在还不是时候。”
languages.original_text: "The hour will come, and the Curse of the Wulfen will have me. And that hour approaches. I can hear the crunch of snow beneath claws. But it has not arrived yet."

traits.locale_text: “注定的时刻必将到来，狼人诅咒必将会吞噬我。那一刻已经越来越近了，我也已经听到白雪在狼爪下吱吱作响的声音了，但现在还不是时候。”

languages.text: 「時が来れば、狂狼の呪いが俺を捕らえるだろう。その時は近づいている。奴の爪が雪が砕ける音が聞こえるんだ。だがまだここへたどり着いてはいない」
languages.original_text: "The hour will come, and the Curse of the Wulfen will have me. And that hour approaches. I can hear the crunch of snow beneath claws. But it has not arrived yet."

traits.locale_text: 「時が来れば、狂狼の呪いが俺を捕らえるだろう。その時は近づいている。奴の爪が雪を踏みしめる音が聞こえるんだ。だがまだここへたどり着いてはいない」

languages.text: "Es wird die Stunde kommen, in der mich der Fluch der Wulfen einholen wird. Und diese Stunde naht. Ich kann das Knirschen von Schnee unter Klauen hören. Aber noch ist sie nicht da."
languages.original_text: "The hour will come, and the Curse of the Wulfen will have me. And that hour approaches. I can hear the crunch of snow beneath claws. But it has not arrived yet."

traits.locale_text: "Es wird die Stunde kommen, in der mich der Fluch der Wulfen einholen wird. Und diese Stunde naht. Ich kann den Schnee schon unter den Krallen knarzen hören. Aber noch ist sie nicht da."

languages.text: «Llegará la hora en que la maldición de los Wulfen me lleve. Y esa hora está cada vez más próxima. Oigo la nieve crujir bajo sus garras. Pero aún no me ha alcanzado».
languages.original_text: "The hour will come, and the Curse of the Wulfen will have me. And that hour approaches. I can hear the crunch of snow beneath claws. But it has not arrived yet."

traits.locale_text: «Llegará la hora en que la maldición de los Wulfen me lleve. Y esa hora está cada vez más próxima. Oigo el crujir de la nieve bajo sus garras. Pero aún no me ha alcanzado».

languages.text: "Gün gelecek, Börü Laneti beni bağrına basacak. O gün yaklaşmakta. Her adımında pençelerinin altında ezilen kar sesi kulaklarımda. Ancak o gün, bugün değil."
languages.original_text: "The hour will come, and the Curse of the Wulfen will have me. And that hour approaches. I can hear the crunch of snow beneath claws. But it has not arrived yet."

traits.locale_text: "Gün gelecek, Börü Laneti beni bağrına basacak. O gün yaklaşmakta. Her adımında pençelerinin altında ezilen kar sesi kulaklarımda. Ancak henüz o gün, bugün değil."
